thread.section_title: eUKhost Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eUKhost Ltd | www.eukhost.com | 4 of 18
thread.title: Paul B
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Paul B

author: Paul B
title: Paul B
text:
Doing a full server move is one of the most stressful times in a web designers life and after having a bad experience with my old host, I was apprehensive and that was putting it mildly!
It would have been foolish for me to expect the move to go without problems but every issue encountered, was worked on around the clock and fixed in a timely manner - they really went the extra mile to get my server working as it needed to be.
My first contact was with Neil Wilson @ eUKhost who reassured me and helped through every stage of the process and ensured that any issues were dealt with as quickly as possible. Neil still checks in to make sure that everything is to my satisfaction and working as it should.
I would not hesitate to recommend eUKhost, good price and excellent service and support!
